IK ., ACCORDANCE WITH THE PROTOCOL Off JULY 16 REGaRDING "COAL DELIVERIES.Je soussigne ROLEN JAECiTBIaYiTS agis- I, the undersigned. ROLIN-oant en qualite de Secretaire- JAEQ3E.OTS, acting as general de la Conference de Spa Secretary-General of thecertifie quo le- present document est une copie conforms de 1Toriginal qui sera depose auxConference at Spa, certify that this document is a true' copy of the original -which will he deposited, in the archives of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the French Republic in Paris,archives du minister*re des Affaires Etrange*res de la republique f^ancaise a Paris, Loo souesignes, agissant respectivement au non de la Prance, do la Grande-Brotagne, de lUtalle, ainsi que de la Belgique, conviennent par lee preeentes des dispositions suivantes:. (l) Des avanoes seront faites au Gouvernement allemand en oonformite du Protocole concernant les livraisons de charbon aux Allies par PAllemagne, signe" & la date de ce jour, et les Gouvernement3 signataires prennent chacun la responsabilite d!effectuer lesditeo avanoes dans lee proportions suivantes:Prance 61 pour cent.ffrande-Bretagne 24.,,Italie 7Belgique 8 ,,(2) Lesdites avances seront rembourcees, avec inte"r t au taux de six pour cent 1*an, au plus tard jjlfe ler Mai 1921 sur les premiers paiements faits en expansion^oes.par le Gbuvernement allemand au titre dee reparations; ell-es sTajouteront aux charges incombant au Gouvernement allemand en vertu du Traits de Versailles ou de tous accords complementaires, et jouiront (sous reserve de I1approbation de la Commission des Reparations en rertu de Particle 248 dudit Traite) d'une priority absOlue sur ce3 autres charges.Spa, 16 juillet 1920. (Pile imd^rolg-ned acting respectively in the name of the Governments of $ranee, Great Britain, Italy and al3 0 of Belgium, hereby agree as fellows:-(l) Advances shall he made to the German Government in aocordanoe "flith the Protocol relating to the deliverie of coal to the Allies by Germany, signed today, and the signatory Governments shall severally take responsibility for the making of the said advances in the following proportions, viz:-Prance 61 per centGreat Britain 24 per centItaly 7 per cent,Belgium 8 per cent(2) Such advances shall be repaid with interest at the rate of 6 per cent per annum not later than May 1, 1921, out of the first payments made by the German Government in cash, on account of'reparation, and shall be additional to and (subject.to the approval of the Reparation Commission under Article 248 of the Treaty of Versailles) shall have absolute priority over all charges against the German Government arising under that Treaty or any agreements supplementary thereto,(Signed) Leon Delaoroix(Signed) DoLloyd George(Signed) AJIillerand(Signed) CSforzaSpa, July 16, 1920,Le Secretajiire-General de la Conference de Spa (S signed) Rolin Jaequemyns.
